root.name: loadImage()
root.description: Loads an image into a variable of type PImage. Only .png images may be loaded. To load correctly, images must be located in the data directory of the current sketch. In most cases, load all images in setup() to preload them when the program starts. Loading images in draw() can dramatically reduce the speed of a program.

parameter.label: filename
parameter.description: string: name of file to load, must be .png
